EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Transformation Council_SF_Q216.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Confirmation: Transformation Council in San Francisco May 11-12
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Transformation Council in San Francisco on May 11–12.
Agenda Overview
Wednesday, May 11: Private Dinner 6:30–10:00pm
Location: Parallel 37 <[[http://www.ritzcarlton.com/en/hotels/california/san-francisco/dining/parallel-37]]>, 600 Stockton Street, San Francisco, CA 94108
Thursday, May 12: Transformation Talk & Workshop
Location: The Pearl SF <[[http://thepearlsf.com/]]>, 601 19th St, San Francisco, CA 94107
We look forward to you joining us.
The Pivotal Transformation Team
P.S. Please let us know if you have any dietary restrictions by emailing events@pivotal.io <[[mailto:events@pivotal.io]]>.
